description: Yorito and Aono have made a decision on how to return things to the way they were. Mana tries to get Yorito to tell her who he really is, but in vain. Later, Mana is out with her friends and she brings up Yorito in conversation but discovers that everyone else but her has already forgotten about him. Scared of what this means, Mana runs to the school roof where she meets Yorito.
